Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product holds significant value to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its exceptional attributes, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that not only serves its purpose exceptionally well but also represents a rare investment in innovation and excellence. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
